quote.quotepara: I've ran into an I18N issue with the 2.0.2 release tag. It doesn't work. I get an error message. However, trunk works just fine. My best guess is due to the difference in Cocoon versions.
Yes, this seems to be the case: https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=44605#c2
Should we ship with the current Cocoon snapshot instead?
